extension.description: Fetches official stream urls/ids from various streaming services, and sends them to their equivalent Kodi add-on for playback.[CR]NOTE: This add-on uses free and legal resources for it's purposes. User has to have installed and configured (with linked active account where required) the supported services' equivalent add-ons in order to achieve playback.
